_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of a demon and brother
of Upasunda, who were sons of 
Nikumbha. [They got a boon from the
Creator that they would not die until
they should kill themselves. On the
strength of this boon, they grew very
oppressive and Indra had at last to
send down a lovely nymph named 
TilottamƒÅ, and while quarrelling for her,
they killed each other].
